sub_title: Executive Assistant - Bridgestone Mobility Solutions - Bridgestone company
summary: As an all-round Assistant I am at my best while working at a company that nurtures proactive people. I would like to be part of a high-performing team, within an innovative, people oriented and forward looking company. Where I can lead various projects and have the freedom to take initiative. I am accurate and I go above and beyond in my work. My creative thinking helps me to find solutions and turn ideas into action. I have strong organizational skills. Meeting deadlines with a fine attention to detail. Furthermore, I am a leader when I need to be and always supportive. When I make strategic decisions, I succeed. Through the years I have cultivated a strong professional network. How can I contribute to the productivity and efficiency of your organization?

profile_positions.description:
Reorganization, discontinue study 

» Support:
Report to and support of the Vice President Clinical & Medical Europe, support of the European Medical Affairs team: MD Medical Affairs, MD Scientific Communication, MD Clinical Developm., MSL team and support of the Chief Medical Officer (US), heads of Regulatory and Pharmacovigilance and department. Assist the VP with the internal preparation meetings for the Committee for Advanced Therapies of EMA. Prioritize workload involving multiple large projects, various coordinating activities such as: implementation and structure of Teams and SharePoint. Onboarding and mentoring new starters. Business support, distribute agenda, provide supporting meeting material, complex diary and travel managment.

» Finance - Legal: 
Assist the VP with the preparation of the departmental annual budget and review of monthly expenditure.

Personal accomplishment: Facilitate on the job training and guidance to the European Medical Affairs team about maintaining an efficient financial and legal contract process. Regularly consulting with the Legal and Financial department and monitoring all outgoing contracts and payments.

» Events: 
Coordinating the European congresses (EHA, COSTEM, EBMT) and support the US team with the Global congresses (ASH), European advisory boards, symposiums and round table discussions.

Personal accomplishment: Organizational and logistics lead for the COSTEM, exhibition and symposium. Instructing and consulting the PR and Medical Education agency, booth builder and congress organization. Meeting tight deadlines, keep track of prep schedule, budget and logistics. Support development interactive slide deck. Comply with rules and regulations. 

» Commissions: 
Administrative support of the MPRC and Publication Commission. Supporting the MD Scientific Communication with rewriting medical SOP’s and the development of scientific comm. and education such as, abstracts and reprints. Developing a tracking spreadsheet.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Medical Affairs Europe - Biotechnology, Cell Therapy, T Cell, NK Cell, ATIR101

profile_positions.description:
Contractor 

» Support: 
Report to and support of the Director Medical Affairs, support of the Medical Affairs team: Medical Project Manager, Medical Scientist and the Legal department: the Associate Director Legal, Legal & Compliance Counsel. Prioritize workload involving multiple large projects, various coordinating activities such as, the implementation of software applications. Resource to other assistant, onboarding and mentoring new starters. Business support, complex diary and travel management.

» Finance - Legal:
Financial and administrative support of the Medical Affairs team and Legal department. Assist the Director Medical Affairs with the preparation of the Medical departmental annual budget, review of monthly expenditure and Concur expenses. GDPR, preparing contracts, facilitating the contract approval in Oracle, financial processing from contracts through to payment and regularly consulting with the Legal department.

» Events: 
Supporting the Medical Affairs team with coordinating large events during congresses, advisory boards, round table discussions and third-party events. Various coordinating activities such as, planning and logistics and meeting tight deadlines. Comply with rules and regulations.

» Commissions: 
Administrative support of the GPRC. Assisting the Community & Public Affairs Manager. 

Personal Accomplishment: Restructured the application process for grants and projects, to make it as efficient as possible. Developing a tracking spreadsheet and standardized forms, to follow requests from submission until final approval and payment, for compliance purposes and financial reporting.

» Medical Support:
Support of the Director Medical Affairs, Manager Drug Safety & Pharmacovigilance Responsible Person Benelux and the international PV department. Administrate medical information requests, monthly DSPH and safety reporting. Prepare internal medical audits and transparency administration (CGR).
profile_positions.title: Administrative Coordinator Medical Affairs & Legal Department- Oncology /IFI, HIV, Hepatitis

profile_positions.description:
» Support: 
Report to and support of the head of Sales & Marketing, support of the Medical Director, Marketing Manager, Finance Manager, Benelux MSL and Sales team. Prioritize workload involving multiple large projects, various coordinating activities such as, facilitating e-learn material and the implementation of software applications. Facility management, business support, controlling deadlines, distribute agenda, provide supporting meeting material, taking detailed meeting minutes for the Brand team, complex diary, travel and fleet management.

» Finance - Legal:
Support of the Finance Manager, preparing contracts, facilitating the contract approval in SAP, financial processing from contracts through to payment and preparing the monthly sales figures. Good distribution practice and informing the warehouses about orders.

» Events: 
Support of the Marketing Manager, coordinating the event administration and activity list, main contact for marketing related agencies, printing and logistics. Preparation of marketing materials and processing in Zinc. Tracking on quantities, quality and distribution.

» Medical Support: 
Support of the Medical Director with pharmacovigilance, regulatory and LSO tasks such as, coordination and processing of medical information requests, screening of local literature, safety reporting and records maintenance. Assist with the development of medical SOP’s. Prepare internal audits, comply with rules and regulations, transparency administration (CGR, pharma.be) and the distribution of reimbursement dossiers.
profile_positions.title: Medical, Sales & Marketing Team Assistant Benelux - oncology, neurology

profile_positions.description:
» Support: 
Report to and support of two Directors, support of the Project Managers and Software Developers. Various coordinating activities such as, organizing company events. Implementation and control of information systems. Customer relations, facility management, business support, controlling deadlines, distribute agenda, taking detailed meeting minutes, complex diary and fleet management.

» Human Resources: 
Assist the Directors with recruitment activities such as, preparing contract, making office policies and processes, developed an employee handbook, vacation and sick leave administration, confidant for employees, main contact for pension related questions and health and safety service.

» Finance - Legal:
Assist the Directors with the financial and legal administration such as, preparation of the payroll, annual budget, debtor and creditor management, financial year end balance sheets, tax returns, cash flow management, the deduction of R&D costs, financial processing from contracts through to payment, contract administration and legal question. Regularly consulting with the accountant.

volunteer_experiences.description:
»The Grandads and Grandmothers, Pass On A Pet Foundation (OOPOEH) was established to connect elderly people who need company with pets who need a babysitter. Many elderly people would like to have a pet, but cannot or will not take full care anymore. The OOPOEH Foundation offers a solution for them and links them to a pet from the neighborhood so that they can enjoy each other's company.

As an ambassador for the OOPOEH Foundation, I help attract new OOPOEHs and pet owners. 
By organizing activities and setting up various neighborhood initiatives, I hope to reach our target group and make them enthusiastic for the OOPOEH Foundation. I established more attention by talking to local entrepreneurs, welfare organizations, community centers, healthcare institutions and media.

» Present Your Startup is an accelerator program and a successful pitch event. We connect startups, businesses and investors by organizing events and training programs.

Present Your Startup is inspired by the TV-programs Dragons’ Den & Shark Tank, but with an innovative twist. The concept is an initiative by Valérie Vallenduuk, lawyer-partner of Vallenduuk Advocaten, who asked herself: How can I connect startups to investors? In 2014, she created Present Your Startup. Since then, the concept has grown more and more. Nowadays, Present Your Startup is also active internationally in Curaçao and New York.

» We envision a world where all young people are able to shape their future the way they see it. A world in which they are able to make healthy sexual choices and develop healthy relationships. That is what Dance4Life stands for.

Unsafe sex is one of the top and fastest growing health risks for millions of young people globally. It particulary affects those most vulnerable and living in the poorest countries. Dance4Life is determined to change this. Forever.
